#ColdFusion on Wheels and all of the tools included in CFML engines offer quite a useful toolset. Here's how to best combine the 2 together.

ColdFusion on Wheels mixes the best of both worlds: increased productivity characteristic of the Ruby on Rails framework along with the best-in-class tool set provided through built-in CFML tags and functions.

Much of this chapter is a reference for which layer of the MVC pattern is most appropriate for each tag or function. Here's how you can take advantage of CFML elements while still honoring Wheels MVC best practices.

==Agree to Disagree==

There are times that it is appropriate to break these best practices, but we'll try to present as pure of a view as possible. Be sure to leave a comment below if you disagree with anything or if you have any CFML usage questions.
